other_tests.findings: Histological findings demonstrated a low-grade neoplasia (grade-I chondrosarcoma).
A novel heterozygous mutation in the EXT1 gene (c.848T>A) changing a leucine codon into a stop codon (p.L283X) was identified.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The same heterozygous nonsense mutation was detected in the patient's mother.
